Uses of Package
com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity

  • Packages that use com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity

  • Classes in com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity used by com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities 
    Class Description
    YaegerEntity
    A YaegerEntity can be used to display anything that is a child of a Node.
  • Classes in com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity used by com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity 
    Class Description
    Anchorable  
    AnchorPoint
    An AnchorPoint denotes the point of an YaegerEntity which is being used for placement on the x,y-coordinate.
    Bounded
    Implementing this interface exposes the Bounded.getNonTransformedBounds() method, which returns the bounds, aka Bounding Box, of this Entity.
    Location
    A Location is a 2D geometric point that represents a pair of coordinates.
    NodeProvider
    Being a NodeProvider guarantees that a Node, if set, is accessible.
    Placeable
    A Placeable has a methods that can be used to place it at a different x,y-coordinates on the YaegerScene.
    Removeable
    A Removeable denotes an Object, most likely an YaegerEntity, that is eligible for removance from its parent.
    Rotatable
    Implementing the interface Rotatable will result in de availability of the Rotatable.setRotate(double) method.
    SceneChild
    A SceneChild is part of a YaegerScene and has thus access to width and height of the YaegerScene it is part of.
  • Classes in com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity used by com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.collisions
